alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:26AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Alcovy River near High Point affecting Newton County. Tucsawhatchee Creek near Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tucsawhatchee Creek near Hawkinsville. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands...fields and pastures begin upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highways 257 and 27. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 11 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
